value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|It's finally summertime,
$Nu!
Come on, let's get going!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Commander Anna, we've been
over this. You need to explain
these things to our friend here.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|It's simple: summer means
beaches, and beaches mean
swimsuits!$k$pMen and women, civilians and
soldiers, all coming together
for a single cause...$k$pLiberation! Every summer we
liberate ourselves from
restrictive clothing.$k$pIt's how we fully enjoy the
weather! Let's go,
$Nu!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|This Outrealm tropical resort is
under Emblian control.$k$pWe should be able to find some
swimsuit-clad Heroes somewhere
around here...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Swim17,Face|$w0|Oh, hello. I'm Robin, a tactician of
Ylisse. We were trying to enjoy the
lovely weather, but...$k$p$WmMPID_水着チキ覚醒,ch04_12_Tiki_F_Swim17,Face|$w0|Well, it looks like we have to carry
out our contract and fight you.
Sorry about this.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Ohh, you two are really dressed for
the season! Those swimsuits just
scream "profit"! $k$pEr, "liberation"! Right. Anyway, sit
tight and we'll get those contracts
taken care of!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|You're more motivated than usual,
Commander Anna. Wait...is that a
new tome?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|This baby was developed by yours
truly for capturing picture-perfect
shots of the scenery.$k$pI came up with it to help with record
keeping, but...$k$pToday I'm using it for snapshots of
these swimsuit-clad Heroes!
Hehehe...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|I know that laugh... That is not a good
laugh.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|Oh, Alfonse. You're ignoring the big
picture. If I can inspire the masses
and fill our coffers, that's a win-win!$k$pSo let's break their contracts and
then teach them how to strike a pose!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_水着ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Swim17,Face|$w0|Let's retreat. We'll have a tactical
advantage if we can meet up with
our friends and bolster our numbers.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|No, wait! I haven't gotten enough
shots! You still need to look coy, and
like, "Oh, I didn't see you there!"$k$p$Sbs150|
